subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species.
Ichnopus taurus
Costa , 1853
, monotypy
.

Remarks. Based on the simple first gnathopods, with a long ischium and long to very long carpus and a dactylus with complex spination,
Ichnopus
is most similar to
Eclecticus
and
Nagada
.
Ichnopus
differs from both genera in having a deep to moderately cleft telson.
